name: BallFall
description:
This game is made as a hypercasual-arcade  fun game and it is still on development.  Your purpose in game:

            PROTECTİNG THE BALL FROM HİTTİNG THE  OBSTACLES.

So did you play the game ? If you played,  did you like? what  do you think about deviation mechanic? And finally  what is your highscore?
